message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it's a great investment for anyone looking to enhance their experience. I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $140. This is an opportunity to save $10 while enjoying all the benefits this product has to offer. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal.
